title: Meet Dr. Mylaine Riobé
description: Discover the expertise of Dr. Mylaine Riobé, an integrative medicine specialist at the NY Center For Integrative Health. Schedule a consultation today!
cleaned_text: Meet Dr. Mylaine Riobé With over 20 years of experience, Dr. Mylaine Riobé has helped her clients overcome challenging symptoms and difficult illnesses by addressing the root causes rather than just masking the symptoms. Her passion is to empower her clients to thrive, prevent diseases, and live their best lives. A graduate of Columbia University in New York City, where she grew up, Dr. Riobé later obtained her medical degree at New York Medical College and completed her residency in Obstetrics and Gynecology at Medical College of Pennsylvania and the University of South Carolina. She learned conventional medical practices that she used for four years following her graduation and board certification in OB/GYN. Dr. Riobé grew increasingly frustrated with the "cookie-cutter" Western medicine that she had learned and practiced. Although Western medicine serves its purpose for acute, life-threatening conditions, she felt that it did not serve to help clients prevent disease or treat chronic diseases in an effective way. She allowed her passion to treat the root cause of a problem to lead her to traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), Integrative medicine, and Functional medicine. She obtained a second board certification in the exciting new field of Integrative medicine in 2017. Dr. Riobé incorporates these three disciplines into her practice to provide an integrative, customized approach combining leading-edge modern medical testing and technology with time-tested energy-based methods of TCM. As a doctor, entrepreneur, and mom, the doctor knows first-hand how easy it is to be consumed by a hectic lifestyle. She enjoys practicing what she preaches by eating healthy, meditating, making time for her family and herself, and working out. She also stays on the path to prevention by obtaining her annual integrative check-up, and encourages others to do the same. Dr. Riobé is the founder of Awakened Wellness Now where she teaches and coaches clients to achieve self-empowerment in wellness. Post Graduate Trainings / Certifications - Academy of Pain Research/ St Luke's Hospital, San Francisco, Ca - Chinese Herbal Medicine - Acupuncture for Physicians - Chinese Herbal Rescue Formulae - Cosmetic Acupuncture Seminars, Denver, Co - University of Miami - Art and Science of Acupuncture-Advanced Course - Bioesthetic Regenerative Therapy - Fellowship in Anti-Aging Regenerative & Functional Medicine, Boca Raton, Fl - Metabolic and Functional Approach to Endocrinology - Bio-Identical Hormone Therapies - Advanced Functional Testing Strategies - IV Therapies - Metabolic and Functional Approach to Endocrinology - Helms Medical Institute, Berkeley, Ca - Essentials of Chinese Herbal Medicine Board Certifications - Integrative Medicine - Ob-Gyn Publications - 2016: The Tao of Integrative Medicine - 2016: The Answer to Cancer - 2021: FAITH - Fearlessly Affirming and Intending to Transform Health [Dr. Robert Kachko](https://www.nycintegrative.com/meet-dr-robert-kachko/), Founder and Director of the NY Center for Integrative Health, is a pioneer in Naturopathic and Integrative Medicine and has developed an extensive bio-psychosocial methodology for people living with chronic diseases. As Immediate Past President of the [American Association of Naturopathic Physicians](https://naturopathic.org/), Dr. Kachko advocates for healthcare reform to allow everyone accesses to the kind of care our clinic provides.
